      • verifyDetails

        public boolean verifyDetails(java.lang.String amount,
                             int fuelSelected,
                             java.lang.String dName,
                             int nid,
                             int limit)
        Verify Customer input, if all details are correct create new Purchase that will be send to the server.
        Parameters:
        amount - - Fuel amount or Price limit.
        fuelSelected - - Fuel ID number.
        dName - - Driver name(If its company customer).
        nid - -Station Network ID.
        limit - - 0- Amount limit, 1- Price limit.
        Returns:
        true- if all details correct, false- if one of the input details is wrong.
